p: Tracer 653 Assay (Molecular Targeting Technologies Inc.) was performed as described ( 22). Briefly, 100 Î¼l of tracer dye was injected intravenously and allowed to circulate passively in each mouse for 1 h. Tracer dye was then quantified with in vivo imaging system (IVIS) (PerkinElmer). Vascular leakage in regions of interest were quantified using Living Image 3.0, and average radiance in selected areas [infected joint, Log 10(p/s/cm 2/sr)] were determined.
